Events that occurred on 5 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1912 - Actor John Le Mesurier is born.
1933 - New Zealand actor Noel Appleby is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 59.
1981 - The fifth episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
2001 - Actor Theodore Isidore Gottlieb dies of pneumonia.
2016 - The Story of Kullervo is published in the USA.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Frodo and Sam, rescued out of the fire, rest in Ithilien.
